goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 202 KB)
graph_title: Total assistance for development, by donor countries (millions of current United States dollars)
indicator_name: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries and type of flow (e.g. official development assistance, foreign direct investment and other flows)
target_name: 개도국에 대한 공적개발원조와 자금 거래 장려
un_custodian_agency: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
page_content: ▶ Data type: Estimated data by international organizations (Type2) This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling. If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
target: Encourage official development assistance and financial flows, including foreign direct investment, to States where the need is greatest, in particular least developed countries, African countries, small island developing States and landlocked developing countries, in accordance with their national plans and programmes
national_indicator_description: This indicator is defined as the sum of all resource flows for development.

source_other_info_1: The following data can be found in the Statistics on International Development - Final UK Aid Spend 2017 publication - Table C1. UK Net ODA 1970-2017 (£ millions) and Data underlying the SID tables.
title: Untitled
